Title: Relates to authorizing grants for the implementation of the seal of civic readiness program
Summary: Relates to authorizing grants for the implementation of the seal of civic readiness program; authorizes grants of $50,000 to no more than 20 applicant school districts for public schools that have successfully completed both the seal of civic readiness application and commissioner created grant application.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to authorizing grants for the implementation of the seal of civic readiness program
